title: REDUCED: 1912-14 Boston American Postcard - RABBIT MARANVILLE

posts.post_title: REDUCED: 1912-14 Boston American Postcard - RABBIT MARANVILLE
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following 1912-15 (c1914) Boston Daily American Postcard featuring HOFer Rabbit Maranville. 

Offering it first on Net54 since we have a few postcard lovers on the board. PM or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url].

[STRIKE]$1,350[/STRIKE] $1,200 OBO (paypal f/f preferred)

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/hofrookies1/websize/1912-14%20Maranville.jpg[/IMG]

Oh man.....I want that!!!


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
